item.description: We will be meeting at Claudio & Marta's house in South Windsor. Bring food or dessert for the group to share.
item.how_to_find_us: Take I-84 to exit 63 take a right at the end of the exit then at the second light turn right on Avery St and go 2.5 miles and after you pass Phillip Smith School Chesire will be the third left.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: September Fiesta
